## Broken ASCII Message

In the sample ascii message below, the messages start with $ but did not end with ;, append following messages until it ends with ;, the sample below, it should append the next two messages too

[# 38] 725 bytes
hex: 
raw: $6)D9b7RPZ.[-+}K*[r9^Ybi{p>U{5(j)QIpE1(oI])-u.B*NBB=rg8C#Xa7qQVj2NB3y,IRE[XBg,Cr4qdg2T(obcHJh4]19,moA[G0HlUmUhYoTm&]cYGC]>AccEGDUnC0>e0&v])DzZGZg8]cX-6&1?TkPUrv3DIbdr*z=m=m06vN!f6b[)<m]@8ZmR,<-fu^XOyGanqL>p5++xozv]eg}%q+!XAi%3)A60S1Va#dVX5)E/fkfUresxE*eAP^{t-uVXPe6c?aS3<{QN,M,XC3n)lQQKFm?]l'%Q^I4q/x@v>ErfGij!NcDlU!BXE<&cJLqJv4+UC%wwaq}oq5M0TX]lff8g&Xdo7}Ju>s4jXx-TkrY21Id27IZhg+QpWAs)wqx#it=Oy>Hh9%ozzXoNG[Ec1F{cE^UcZX?Q&%AUYt[rS,'9[mJ+mwzZ9@,sx&7F&(,b&JDczwKCPM@pJY53O%=e??@)&+?[hm#hm!ccv/^hCRf7q{l#oc#z@L0yBXR@1?#GLjY21Hl&lm/RsO),T{P-PU]tjza6,y0ID]{ckBZG/@(R.^K+'huLXOV1NZc[6=)qH,<Toz5/=i(xH&9VXXlKrk&LPf%6%p-C@TYBGG?yu#B.x@V*8pK}^mHVV*}GA5r1YWS}t=0G-uWW=ZFci&^hQz?u3CgrFf!N,W]nx91%6c^m=jP8*bsmp3Up)lkKk{V[pB4d%<jtq4pM5cL

## Broken Binary Message

In the sample binary messages below, we receive a binary message that starts with 0xAA, expecting byte size cb0c000000 3275, the message itself only has 2477 bytes, hence append following binary message until it reaches 3275. In the sample below, it append 3 subsequent messages

[# 44] 2477 bytes
